name: Research Agent Evaluation
description: Tests the research agent's ability to generate design best-practice rules.

parts.text: {"rules": ["Ensure high contrast between text and background", "Avoid busy or distracting patterns", "Use subtle gradients or textures", "Maintain a consistent visual theme", "Test readability in different lighting conditions", "Keep background elements minimal", "Prioritize content over decoration", "Use a simple, professional color palette"]}
